title: Growing Food in Urban Small Spaces - Urban Gardening

subtasks: Showcasing raised beds and containers (plastic, grow bags, wood, terracotta)
Presenting dwarf fruit trees (pear, peach, plum)
Guiding through five years of gardening progress
Constructing and using a waist-high salad bar raised bed
Introducing vertical gardening with blue storage totes for carrots
Touring the front porch containers (herbs, peppers)
Discussing container-grown plum tree and potatoes
Using tutu tool for pest protection (leaf miners)
Growing garlic for scapes and harvest
Vertical growing with cucumbers and cucamelons trellises
Showcasing 28 tomato varieties and their maturity
